source.dockerfile:
FROM python:3.11-slim

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
        tesseract-ocr \
        tesseract-ocr-por \
        libgl1 \
        libglib2.0-0 \
        poppler-utils \
        build-essential \
        pkg-config \
        python3-dev \
        wget \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

WORKDIR /app

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \
    fastapi \
    uvicorn[standard] \
    pymupdf \
    pillow \
    pytesseract \
    requests


EXPOSE 8000

CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]

from fastapi import FastAPI, HTTPException, Request
from pydantic import BaseModel
import requests
from io import BytesIO
import fitz  # pymupdf
from PIL import Image
import pytesseract
import logging
import sys
import time
import asyncio
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor

# ðŸ”¹ Logging forÃ§ado para stdout (Docker-friendly)
logging.basicConfig(
    level=logging.INFO,
    format="%(asctime)s | %(levelname)s | %(message)s",
    datefmt="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S",
    handlers=[logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)],
    force=True
)

app = FastAPI(title="PDF OCR Server")

# ðŸ”¹ Pool de threads para OCR (CPU-bound)
executor = ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=2)


class PDFUrl(BaseModel):
    url: str


@app.middleware("http")
async def log_requests(request: Request, call_next):
    start = time.time()

    logging.info(
        f"Request | {request.method} {request.url.path} "
        f"IP={request.client.host if request.client else 'unknown'}"
    )

    response = await call_next(request)

    logging.info(
        f"Response | Status={response.status_code} "
        f"Time={time.time() - start:.2f}s"
    )

    return response


@app.get("/")
async def health():
    return {"status": "ok"}


def process_ocr(pdf_bytes: bytes):
    logging.info("OCR iniciado (thread separada)")

    doc = fitz.open(stream=BytesIO(pdf_bytes), filetype="pdf")
    pages = []

    total_pages = doc.page_count

    for i, page in enumerate(doc, start=1):
        logging.info(f"OCR pÃ¡gina {i}/{total_pages}")

        pix = page.get_pixmap(dpi=200)
        img = Image.frombytes("RGB", (pix.width, pix.height), pix.samples)

        text = pytesseract.image_to_string(
            img,
            lang="por",
            config="--psm 6"
        )

        pages.append({
            "page": i,
            "text": text.strip(),
            "text_length": len(text.strip())
        })

    doc.close()

    logging.info("OCR finalizado")
    return pages


@app.post("/ocr")
async def ocr_pdf(payload: PDFUrl):
    logging.info("RequisiÃ§Ã£o OCR recebida")

    try:
        response = requests.get(payload.url, timeout=60)
        response.raise_for_status()
    except Exception as e:
        logging.error(f"Erro ao baixar PDF: {e}")
        raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail=str(e))

    loop = asyncio.get_running_loop()

    pages = await loop.run_in_executor(
        executor,
        process_ocr,
        response.content
    )

    return {
        "mode": "ocr",
        "total_pages": len(pages),
        "pages": pages
    }
